data.title: FIFA
data.header: FIFA 23 | Pitch Notes - PC FAQ - EA SPORTS
data.description: PC FIFA 23 players will be able to experience all new generation features and updates, including HyperMotion 2 Gameplay Technology, Advanced 11v11 Match Capture, Machine Learning, and more.

data.title: FIFA
data.header: FIFA 23 | Pitch Notes - FUT Chemistry Update - EA SPORTS
data.description: With FUT 23, our aim is to increase squad variety to enable more diverse teams, make squad building easier and remove common pain points.

data.title: FIFA
data.header: FIFA 23 All Leagues and Clubs List - Electronic Arts
data.description: See the full list of playable clubs and leagues in EA SPORTS FIFA 23.

data.title: FIFA
data.header: FIFA 23 | Pitch Notes - FUT Deep Dive - EA SPORTS Official
data.description: FUT 23 brings a new way to play and earn rewards with FUT Moments, a total overhaul to the Chemistry system that gives you more squad-building flexibility, cross-play, new FUT Heroes, and much more as you build your dream squ…

data.title: FIFA
data.header: FIFA 23 | Pitch Notes - Pro Clubs/VOLTA FOOTBALL Deep Dive - EA SPORTS
data.description: As we look at our cross-play future, we’re focused on matchmaking in Pro Clubs, VOLTA, and FUT Co-op, as well as cross-platform lobby, invites and ultimately cross-platform Pro Clubs.

data.title: FIFA
data.header: FIFA 23 | Pitch Notes - Career Deep Dive - EA SPORTS
data.description: Our additions to FIFA 23 have been primarily driven by the goal of giving more freedom to how you approach Career Mode, both in terms of gameplay and customization.
